fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Environment, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
On behalf of its members, ECA monitors and reports on developments impacting the cocoa sector, (scientific, regulatory and business-related).   
 
ECA also publishes quarterly grind statistics and provides general cocoa-related information to interested parties. 
 
In addition, ECA is actively engaged in European and International fora related to the industry’s contribution to a sustainable cocoa economy.
position: EU Affairs Officer - Trade Policy and Sustainability
